description: Chromium without Google integration, enhancing privacy, control, transparency

name: Webbkoll

description: A web privacy measurement platform.

description: Configuration for Firefox to harden browser settings and make it more secure.

description: Browser extension that automatically hides the referer when changing domains.

description: Browser extension that prevents fingerprinting via Javascript Canvas API.

description: Browser extension to disable WebRTC to avoid leaking your IP address from behind a VPN.

name: Syncthing

name: Tox
description: A peer-to-peer instant messenger aimed at making security and privacy easy to obtain for regular users.

description: Addon that enables you to choose & block top 5 cloud companies based on their IPv4/6 ranges.

description: Browser extension to automatically redirect Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) to the actual HTML page.
